text: For the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/visitor-identification> api should we typically call each time a user logs in to our platform?

Hi, 

Currently recruiting for a remote HubSpot developer - I’m working with a b2b marketing agency and HubSpot diamond partner in the UK who need someone very back end focused to join the team - specifically need someone with API integration expertise. 

If anyone is interested in finding out more drop me a message!

Hey, what’s the best method of removing the users token from a session. For example, when a user logs out on a computer and then a new user logs in. I’ve found

Removing consent banner cookies
If you need to remove the consent banner cookies for a visitor, such as in the case of a GDPR related deletion request, you can use the `revokeCookieConsent` function. See the documentation for the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/tracking-code#remove-cookie|revokeCookieConsent> function for more details.

is this a good method?

Hello <#C2YHAHB6K|api> group. I'm really new to HubSpot and using APIs. If I'm asking a question that is very elementary, forgive me. We have a custom object that a company created for us. I have the active API key attached to our account, but I do not have the object_type_id or object_name.
Is there a way to fetch a custom object schema, without having that information? Or ANY list of custom objects that have been created through our account? Thank you
hey <@U011YHRTQDT>, yes you can get that using *`/crm/v3/schemas`* more information on the object definition tab here - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects>
No. For about seven hours after I posted initially. Then someone bounced some services somewhere and everything started working again.
Just following up. You can go to the page using the ID from web analytics and it will have the campaign name.

Hi! Is here a way to get more data on form submissions then <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/get-submissions-for-a-form> provides?
I need to connect the submission to the contact like it is seen in UI:
Is there a way to access the `Conversations > Templates`  through the API? Thanks in advance!
hello everyone I am trying to set currency in custom quotes template to the deal currency. any idea how to do it?

Hello everyone, I am trying to use the User Provisioning endpoint with the API key but it returns:
```{"status":"error","message":"Authentication credentials not found. This API supports both API Key and OAuth 2.0 authentication and you can find more details at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/auth/oauth-overview>","correlationId":"cdf01db5-510b-4cf0-9af3-3bd16c4ab270","category":"INVALID_AUTHENTICATION"}```
I have already tried with another endpoint and it works, so it is not an invalid API key

Hi - I'm working with out data team to connect tables (extracted using CData). We're trying to connect the Email Events table to contacts somehow. The only option seems to be using Recipient (email address) from <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/email/get_events> events and join that to email on the Contacts table. Does anyone know if there's a way to connect them using VID? <http://cdn.cdata.com/help/DHF/odbc/pg_HubSpottable-emailcampaignevents.htm>
